recipesJson.name: Deep Red Astaire
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This is a remix of T-Juice Red Astaire, that utilizes a deeper berry and cherry note in the mix. Different from Mistaire, which is a bit brighter and sweeter.

Made on:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KBsVNfzuyp4

reviews.text: Excellent job everything blends wonderfully. When I tried MB Red Cherry years back I wasn’t a fan of it, but i’m on my 2nd 60ml of this and really enjoy the red cherry. Might have the experiment with it in the future.
